name: Demon's Wages
description:
This is a story of an ordinary demon with his ordinary job. Help him so he can get his wages!

Chat with people to know what their desires are about: Art, Science, Fame, Wealth or Love. If you bother them too much with a small talk, character would leave. Pay attention to the news - it affects the character desire level, if one the news aspects matches the character desire. Fill their hearts with the desire, and when it turns black - offer them a deal! Their soul will be yours. Collect five souls to be a good worker!

How to find out what’s the character desire:
They can talk about it in a small talk or think about it, standing alone in the pub;
Their desire level changes when news have the aspects, that matches their desire.
When talking about desires, character can react positively (that means that’s his desire), negatively (that means that’s not his desire) or neutral (it can be both).
We would even recommend to write down the character name and their desire (when you find it out) :)
